New Records: James Harden broke a tie with Ray Allen for the No. 2 spot on the NBA's list with 2,974 3-pointers in his career
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Utah Jazz 116-105
Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers will face the Warriors, who are led by Stephen Curry, on Monday
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden said he doesn't ever want to take his accomplishments for granted
Clippers coach Tyronn Lue said Harden is an extraordinary shooter and that his career has been great
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Harden is one of three players in NBA history to have 300 3-pointers in a season
Harden is 15th on the NBA's career list in points and 13th in assists
Others: The article mentions that Curry and the Warriors are in Southern California to face the Clippers on Monday
Harden said he probably won't catch Steph Curry and that he doesn't think anyone will
